trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when `DataBind` is called on the item during a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트가 발생할 때 `DataBind` 라고 하는 항목 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 를 호출 하는 동안</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> object as the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스를 지정 된 설정 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"> </xref> 이벤트의 원본으로는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> that is the source of the event.
Gets the node item that is the source of the event.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> that is the source of the event.
